CreateFacilitySetup.newFacilityStepTitle: Wuro bote heso - falannde {step, number} nder {total, number}
CreateLearnerAccountForm.header: Jaɓugo pukaraajo waɗana hoore muuɗum sigorɗum?
CreateLearnerAccountForm.noOptionLabel: Ɗum jaɓaayi. Dawrooɓe tan ngaɗata sigorɗum
DefaultLanguageForm.languageFormHeader: Suɓtugo ɗemngal ngal kuutinirton Kolibri koo ndeye
DeviceNameForm.deviceNameExplanation: Hokkugo kompiita ɗu'um innde nde siftorta nafay ngam to a hawti bee himɓe feere on keɓtilawayɗum
ErrorPage.errorPageAdditionalGuidance: To haɓdugo huwaayi, maɓɓu-maɓɓutu serwar nden wilitin ɗerewol kompiita.
ErrorPage.errorPageSubheader: Raaru no serwar ma feɗori nden haɓdu fahin.
FacilityNameTextbox.facilityNameFieldMax: Taa' innde wuro bote ɓura ɓaleeri 50
FacilityPermissionsForm.facilityPermissi: Wuro bote ngon woni to serwar Kolibri jooɗoto, bana janngirde, suudu kawtal ekkitaago koo suudu goɗɗo.
FacilityPermissionsForm.formalDescriptio: Janngille feere-feere nder laawol janngirde ngomnati
FacilityPermissionsForm.nonFormalDescrip: Janngille bee kawte janngugo feere-feere naa' nder laawol janngirde ngomnati
GettingStartedForm.advancedSetupDescript: Jey janngille ngomnati, kawtal elto ɓiɓɓe, kawte mawɓe, kala kawtal ngam janngugo to fukaraaɓe ngeeday kuutiniral Kolibri
GettingStartedForm.quickStartDescription: Jey janngingo ɓiɓɓe wuro maaɗa bee jey giɗɗo janngugo feere muuɗum
GettingStartedFormAlt.descriptionParagra: Bee Kolibri a huutiniray bee wuro bote ngam hakkilango moɓgal fukaraaɓe ɗuɗɓe. Misaalu: janngirde, kawtal elto ɓiɓɓe, bee kawte fukaraaɓe feere-feere. A waaway hakkilango iri gure bote feere-feere nder kompiita go'o.
A yiɗi jernugo wuro bote na?
GettingStartedFormAlt.gettingStartedHead: Ɗume woni dabare ma dow huutinirgo bee Kolibri?
GuestAccessForm.description: Jaɓugo koo moye waawa raarugo jannginillum nder Kolibri bannda waɗugo sigorɗum
GuestAccessForm.noOptionLabel: Ɗum jaɓaayi. Sey marɗo sigorɗum tan yi'ata jannginillum nder Kolibri
ImportFacilitySetup.stepTitle: Nastingo wuro bote - {step, number} nder {total, number}
ImportIndividualUserForm.deviceLimitatio: ’{full_name} ({username})’ ɗum {roles} bee ‘{device}’. Kompiita ɗu'um hetanaama ngam fukaraaɓe tan. Kuutinillum jannginooɓe bee dawrooɓe ngalaa.
ImportIndividualUserForm.doNotHaveUserCr: A walaa innde bee sigorɗum kuutiniroowo na?
ImportIndividualUserForm.enterAdminCrede: Winndu innde kuutiniroowo bee paltirgel dawroowo wuro bote koo dawroowo mawɗo '{facility}'
ImportIndividualUserForm.enterCredential: Winndu innde bee paltirgel sigorɗum kuutiniroowo ɗum a yiɗi nastingo
ImportLODUsersSetup.stepTitle: Nastingo sigorɗum kuutiniroowo - {step, number} nder {total, number}
PersonalDataConsentForm.description: To a jerni Kolibri ngam huutinirooɓe feere, an, koo goɗɗo mo a nastini nder kuugal ngal, hakkilanay sigorɗum huutinirooɓe boɗɗum mo aynay tinndinooje dow maɓɓe sigaaɗe nder kompiita ɗu'um.
PersonalSetup.adminAccountCreationDescri: Marɗo sigorɗum ɗu'um waaway hakkilango jannginillum gure janngugo fuu bee sigorɗum huutinirooɓe nder kompiita ɗu'um
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.header: Sigorɗum fukaraaɓe sey bee paltirgel na?
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.noOptionL: A'aa. Winndugo innde kuutiniroowo heƴay ngam nastugo
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.noOptionT: Ɗum nafay to fukaraaɓe ɗum ɓikkon pamaron koo to a anndi walaa mo waɗanta sigorɗum ko halli
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.accountFacil: Sigorɗum ɗuʼum hawteteema bee wuro bote {facility}
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.chooseAdminP: Suɓtu dawroowo diga {facility} koo waɗu dawroowo mawɗo keso
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.description: Sigorɗum ɗu'um nafay bee hakkilango gure bote, jannginillum bee sigorɗum huutinirooɓe nder kompiita ɗu'um.
SetupMethod.descriptionImportLOD: Kompiita ɗu'um jaɓay sannjindirgo feere maajum bee kompiita marɗum Kolibri fuu to wuro bote no go'o
SetupMethod.descriptionParagraph1: Wuro bote woni to serwar Kolibri jooɗoto, bana janngirde, suudu kawtal ekkitaago koo suudu goɗɗo.
SetupMethod.fullDeviceTooltip: Kompiita bee senndirɗum Kolibri kuutinirteeɗum dawrooɓe, jannginooɓe bee fukaraaɓe
SetupMethod.importFacilityAction: Nastin data fuu diga wuro bote
SetupMethod.importLOD: Nastin sigorɗum huutinirooɓe gootum koo ɗuɗɗum diga wuro bote
SetupMethod.initializeDevice: Suɓtugo jernillum wuro bote jey kompiita ɗu'um
SetupMethod.lod: Kompiita ɗu'um ɗum jey pukaraajo tan
SetupMethod.lodTooltip: Kompiita maray kuutinillum fukaraaɓe Kolibri tan, bannda kuutinillum jannginooɓe bee dawrooɓe
SuperuserCredentialsForm.adminAccountCre: Sigorɗum ɗu'um nafay bee hakkilango gure bote, jannginillum bee sigorɗum huutinirooɓe nder kompiita ɗu'um
SuperuserCredentialsForm.rememberThisAcc: Hakkil: Taa' yejjutu ko annduɗa dow sigorɗum ɗu'um. Winnduɗum, siga boɗɗum
YesNoForm.details: A waaway sannjugoɗum yeeso nder settings wuro bote maaɗa
